name: European Network of Forest Entrepreneurs e.V.
goal:
ENFE is the European representation of forest entrepreneurs which are service providers for forest operations and forest management. Ordinary members are the respective national association of forest entrepreneurs.

In the beginning of 2015 Enfe merged its lobbying activities with Ceettar organisation.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment
euInitiatives: All related to forestry and bioenergy, vocational training, competition, public procurement, social dialogue, forest certification, sustainability and biodiversity
